oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Martin College, Pulaski, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Colorized photograph of graduates and other students standing in front of Martin College. Green one-cent George Washington postal stamp is glued on upside down on message side. Handwritten note, "Can you find Lizzie Grey on this?
Female college earlier known as Martin Methodist College, founded ca. 1870 by bequest of Thomas Martin. School became coeducational in 1938.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; Universities & colleges;
